quotes.quote: Everyone expects us to have a sense of urgency for life's big things. Life measures us by how we engage ourselves in the little things.
You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
Success requires both urgency and patience. Be urgent about making the effort, and patient about seeing the results.
Urgency makes the difference between practitioners, proclaimers and procrastinators.
No other species flees from boredom with as much urgency as we do. We are far more eager to do brain work than we are to do physical labor.
A higher rate of urgency does not imply ever-present panic, anxiety, or fear. It means a state in which complacency is virtually absent
Move fast. A sense of urgency is the one thing you can develop that will separate you from everyone else. When you get a good idea, do it now.
Whatever your goal in life, unless you develop a great urgency, what could be near will be far away.
We ourselves are imbued with urgency, yet the message of our society is' that there is no viable alternative to the present.
A life of fulfillment is one in which we put urgency in its place and remember that the ultimate target is to spend our lives doing the things we believe are most important to us.
There must be a sense of urgency before anything can ever happen.
The urgency derives from the nearness of climate tipping points.

We are now faced with the fact that tomorrow is today. We are confronted with the fierce urgency of now. In this unfolding conundrum of life and history, there "is" such a thing as being too late. This is no time for apathy or complacency. This is a time for vigorous and positive action.
We have to live life with a sense of urgency, so not a minute is wasted.
Urgency and vision are the twin pillars on which humanity's hope now hangs.
Urgency means paying the details the attention they deserve, with the respect they deserve, without delay.
Urgency fills our life with stress and anxiety. but slowness, simplicity, and love fill our life with beauty and happiness.
There is one clear urgency in your life that you must never neglect, and that is â€” you must be yourself.
You don't have as much time as you think you do. You got to operate like there's a sense of urgency!
We cannot put off living until we are ready. The most salient characteristic of life is its urgency, 'here and now' without any possible postponement. Life is fired at us point-blank.
Urgency is insecurity.
Life could snatch away the things you treasured, and there was no getting them back. She began to feel an urgency, a need to seize an opportunity. Before anyone else did.
Start from here, now is all you have, there will never be a better place or time and by tomorrow you would have lost more time.
Urgency creates decision making.

There's a sense of urgency in understanding that your body is not really your own. We can control it to a certain extent through habits and good behavior, but there's so much we don't have control of.
Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
Time to improve is limited. The clock is always on and doesn't care if you don't feel like it. Someone else does and they're passing you by.
Learn to let urgency go. Nothing is urgent. Stress is the product of uncertainty and urgency of life.
When you love people, you give them a priority. You have a sense of urgency about their pain.
Dream audaciously. Have the courage to fail forward. Act with urgency.
